item.name: Liquid Brass Knuckles
entries: A great blacksmith forged these brass knuckles for once of the strongest barbarians who ever lived. A different great blacksmith then melted them down for the metal, but the knuckles fought back.

As a bonus action while this vial is on you, you can cause the liquid in this vial to coat an unarmed or natural weapon you have for 1 minute. While coated in this way, the weapon deals extra damage equal to half of your strength modifier (Rounded up, Minimum of 0).
Additionally, if use an ability or spell that grants you a natural weapon (Such as Alter Self), you can choose to cause the liquid to coat that weapon as part of the ability or spell.
Once a weapon has been coated by the liquid, the vial cannot be used again for 1 hour.
